column4: So, Microsoft did a huge, imperialistic marketing movement, and owned the 90% of the market share. Now, we (= users that have realized that Windows sucks) have to suffer the consequences: NO support from many big software and hardware vendors... :-(
I just don't want to use Windows. We live in a democratic society. Why don't Gamer-makers and Hardware-makers think of me?
you have to give their marketing guys credit though...no other company could convince people not only that they're going to buy crap, but also that they like it :)
